website_summaries.verdict: The target map on this bag gives you visual feedback on your accuracy – specifically on your lag and forward shaft lean.
pros: Made of heavy-duty, high-impact PVC and nylon
Helps you learn correct clubface impact
Target map provides visual feedback on the quality and accuracy of the impact
Use with slower, smoother swings to practice technique
Grommet near bottom lets you anchor bag

customer_reviews.title: It's just a big empty bag
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the money and put several beach towels in an old Army surplus duffel bag. It's practically the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Daedalus

customer_reviews.title: Good idea; bad product.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it zero if I could. Do not buy this product. It split open at the bottom seam on by first not-very-hard swing. SKLZ products should not be purchased. It's a great indoor swing training idea, but you should purchase one from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Coiner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Thin breakable material
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product until it starts to break down. I literally have only used it a few days and I've only hit it approximately 15 to 20 times per day for a few days and it's already breaking down on me! very thin material. And not durable at all. I'm extremely disappointed and hopefully the seller will give me a full refund or possibly replace the item
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Palace

customer_reviews.title: This item is helping me regain my game after a long layoff.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is the best product for checking for proper hand and arm position at impact. Same for having proper balance on each leg at impact. Using the small grommet at the bottom rear of the unit with an anchoring pin or stake will also give you to get an indication of a hook or slice tendency at impact. This unit is made of sturdy material so that it can take many blows without showing wear. Tough stuff with a durable Zipper enclosure. Weather Proof Too.
customer_reviews.author: John Tyler Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tool for me. Really helped with "the moment of truth" and got me to fire my hips more routinely. My hips are generally quite lazy in the golf swing. Unfortunately, this bag was not durable for me. I was doing mostly half swing drills 20-25 /day for about 3 weeks before I got my first tear at the bottom seam. I'm disappointed because this was a tool that seem to actually help me with my swing troubles. Probably need to go to the Wiren bag after this completely fails.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely a worthwhile investment. There were a lot of bad reviews on impact bags so I waited but I saw the pro at Ba local range use one and he said his Skilz bag was going on 5 years and that's with a lot of lessons. I think some people take full swings at them which is what they are not designed to do. Also be sure you watch some videos on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps develop forward shaft lean
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work on my forward shaft lean at contact after using one in several golf lessons. It works really well and takes a punch with no ill effects. Just fill it with enough towels so it's reasonably firm and it's great. It seams well made and solid, and I'm very happy with it so far!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Not good for smashing so not good at all
customer_reviews.text: It only took a week and about 100 strikes to this bag to rip it at the seam along the bottom. Seriously folks, this bag needs to be made out of Kevlar or canvas with military grade stitching. It is not. I have a hard time believing the positive reviews after seeing how easily this bag broke. Too bad because a smash bag is a great training aid. I will replace this with a bullet proof bag made by someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: I had a golf lesson and the insturctor said this was a great tool to help me with one of my issues. It really helps
customer_reviews.author: WYO

customer_reviews.title: A two day tool
customer_reviews.text: I am a golf instructor and have used bags like this before, the only difference is that those bags sometimes lasted years. For the price tag of the SKLZ this thing sure bursts out of its bottom seems pretty quick. Took two days to be exact. TWO! Not recommend this at all. Unable to find return or refund options through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rynard van Eeden

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great idea yet like many have mentioned that the seams defiantly start to come undone just after minimal use. You would think the company would either 1) build a durable seam to sustain heavy impacts and or 2) lifetime warranty defective stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fong

customer_reviews.title: Did not make it a month
customer_reviews.text: This bag did not last one month with limited use. The stitching tore in multiple places and the bag has now fallen apart. We have a different model bag at the golf academy, and it has held up great with a lot more use. No drivers used on the bag, only irons used for appropriate training exercises. Spend the extra money and get the better impact bag.
customer_reviews.author: Reelsports

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a training aid, however after a few days it bust open. I tried to contact customer support but no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuytoomuchonamazon

customer_reviews.title: not cure all
customer_reviews.text: product is well made but using it even daily won't improve your game that much
customer_reviews.author: Leon Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for teaching shaft lean into the ball. Very valuable if you want to learn how to hit the ball like the pros.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend for the money
customer_reviews.text: The material seems to be durable. Used it several times now. No problems so far. Would reccomend it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Armagost

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Solid item just not a fan of this training aid
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Bang away young thug
customer_reviews.text: You wanna bang a bag with a golf club? Buy this bag You wanna swing as hard as you can with a golf club? Buy this bag You wanna go fetch that bag after you hit it as hard as you can with a golf club? Buy this bag 10/10 wood bang this bag again
customer_reviews.author: Beelzeberto

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Would have been 5 stars but seam ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Would have been 5 stars but seam ripped slightly directly under the impact spot after 3 weeks use. Still functions (added small piece of tape over seam) with moderate to high swing speed impacts several days per week. Highly recommend the smash bag concept, it has immediate feedback to create lag in the golf swing.
customer_reviews.author: whiplash

customer_reviews.title: A split decision
customer_reviews.text: This is as it appears to be: a golf training smash bag. However, in the first day of use by my high school players, it came apart at the lower seam. It still works, and a little duct tape will take care of the seam, but that's a pretty quick disassembly, shall we say, from a few players with average clubhead speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Filled it with old blanket and whacked away. Will try it with a stake through ring this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Frechette

customer_reviews.title: SEAMS Like Not a good Bye Bye!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sending this product back. Just received not even a full day and it's already busted at the seams. (Female 5' 4'' 120 lbs.) I even checked out YouTube for instructions on what to fill it with and how to use properly.
customer_reviews.author: e!

customer_reviews.title: Product Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bag has already ripped on the bottom after first day of use. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good for inside or outside use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. Good for inside or outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Lil1

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This bag is useless. The 'hitpoint' is at least 8 inches off of the ground and the bag itself is EXTREMELY loud when you do hit it. Absolutely pointless to own. I am embarrassed that I bought this. Chalk it up to another useless 'golf fix' purchase you hear about.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Mine arrived, and was one that one ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Mine arrived, and was one that one of you guys returned. 1, the face paint is slightly warn with a angle. 2, seem on bottom front is open. I'm keeping it. Wife is stitching with heavy thread. But, buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected but I blew the return window so my bad.
customer_reviews.author: brimoo1

customer_reviews.title: good quality smash bag
customer_reviews.text: good quality smash bag. Previously tried another companies bag. Only five hits on that one and there were two open seams. Took it back, got the refund and bought the SKLZ Smash Bag. Hundreds of hits and barely any marks at all. It really takes a beating.
customer_reviews.author: MARKpdx

customer_reviews.title: I don't think SKLZ is getting a good manufacturing partner on these guys
customer_reviews.text: the bag i received was low quality. literally fell apart after a dozen practice sessions. I don't think SKLZ is getting a good manufacturing partner on these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kennemore

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Stitching
customer_reviews.text: The bag did not stand up to basic use. The stitching at the bottom of the bag broke after less than 20 swings. Most of these were half swings.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 50 swings
customer_reviews.text: This broke within one day of use, busted open at the seam. Would not recommend unless you want to continuously be duct taping and replacing it. I would say the value we got out of this was about $2 per swing until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This smash bag was recommended by my instructor who knows what he's doing. It is very well made and should last a long time. You will have to fill it with something. Save up your old towels. That's what I used and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at seam bottom
customer_reviews.text: Seam ripped at the bottom after only about 50 swings. 90 day warranty. Wished I'd started using it before the warranty ended and the Amazon return period expired.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have in a golfers training bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect impact bag for anyone looking for some training tools and improvement aids. Very durable and easy to transport. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is helping my golf swing. I do 20 hits per day and it is great for my game. I have had no problems with breakage or fatigue of the smash bag!
customer_reviews.author: Cwdiede

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Bag deforms pretty badly upon impact but it gets the job done for what it was made for.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Shimoun

customer_reviews.title: Ships Empty
customer_reviews.text: seems to be well made. I don't remember that the description said that the bag was empty. You have to fill it with old towels etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Louisian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good training aid has helped in getting club square into the contact zone .
customer_reviews.author: Tim 623

customer_reviews.title: It isn't quite what he was looking for and we've never come up with a good filler.
customer_reviews.text: My husband only uses it occasionally. It isn't quite what he was looking for and we've never come up with a good filler.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Great for proper impact alignment
customer_reviews.text: This guves a great feeling to help produce lag and the right sense os shaft alignment at impact
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Murphy

customer_reviews.title: For the dad who has everything...
customer_reviews.text: My father is retired and has just about everything he wants or needs, so this made an interesting gift for him. He was excited to fill it up and practice with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lia

customer_reviews.title: Not tough enough to be smashed....
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and the seams split on the bottom of the bag. Filled it up with some old tee shirts, rags and actually some light weight packaging material and it blew apart after just a few swings.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that this bag helps develop and sharpen ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this bag helps develop and sharpen your swing and it can be done indoors in inclement weather. The only negative is finding enough material to fill it!!
customer_reviews.author: John Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Price was very attractive. Most of these are over ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was very attractive. Most of these are over priced for what they are. Stuffed mine with worn out towels and old clothes from the rag bag. Helps to have that reassuring feel of a solid and square club face.
customer_reviews.author: Ike16

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can i say this training drill works. And the Smash bag is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf training aid especially for a young golfer
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Just need to find items to fill it with. We bought cloth tarps to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for the golfer in your
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a surprise. He loves it and uses it often. Recommend for the golfer in your life
customer_reviews.author: Paunique

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool, very noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great training tool to train proper impact position on your golf swing. The only con that I've found with this bag is how loud the "thud" is when hitting it. If you live in an apartment setting with neighbors who are nearby, be careful when you use this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: smash bag
customer_reviews.text: helped me straighten out my horrible slice. gives you a good sense of club position at impact. really taught me how to modify my back swing to be in the proper position and develop muscle memory.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize I had to fill it myself, ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I had to fill it myself, which was my fault for not reading. I didn't have a problem filling it with old towels but it ripped along the bottom seam within the first twenty hits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The SKLZ bag is as good as any other and it is reasonably
customer_reviews.text: The smash bag is a must training aid and is an aid. Several different kinds are being sold by teaching pros world wide. The SKLZ bag is as good as any other and it is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Gale Rauschenberger

customer_reviews.title: This bag is poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Never reviewed a product before, but I hit it less than 50x and the bottom seam exploded. Useless
customer_reviews.author: David Andrew Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased two of these products.... ...
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two of these products....both split up the front seam, the first after one month, the second after only one week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching blown oit
customer_reviews.text: Bottom stitching blew out after 3 days of practice. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A. Wehlus

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: decent golf bag but be careful hitting it near the seems. It will bust.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool, gives you a proper impact fell and shaft angle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W Uren III

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is durable and works great. Have used it everyday and already seeing an improvement in my ball striking.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie b.

customer_reviews.title: Not that strong
customer_reviews.text: Bag split at seam after little use. Repaired with duck tape and it is now okay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bag ripped within a week from wedge use. Use a duffle bag instead of wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Product is designed well and works as intended. It would be nice if it came with some basic instructions on how to use it otherwise you have to find them else where.
customer_reviews.author: Jerryl

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: my old jeans, sweats and t-shirts fill this out nicely the impact is similar to a pure strike but naturally it does not release
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Renewedman

customer_reviews.title: works OK
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, like most impact bags. Fill it with rags or plastic air bubbles and you get a good sense of where the club should be at impact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Bg
customer_reviews.text: I really think this bag can help ones' game. The only problem is that I stop my club face at impact which may impair you from finishing swing.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: looks like it was good quality
customer_reviews.text: bought as gift, looks like it was good quality, fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: Great training aid. Doesn't take up a lot of room and you can use it inside. My game has improved since using the smash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: To practice at home, is very good. Helped me a lot in consistency when practiced outside. For the money you have, it is a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Pedro  A

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at a great price compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: This bag probably won't last you 10 years of daily hard use but it does the job at a fraction of the cost of one that would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Starfox

customer_reviews.title: Weak and Tore Up With Use
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of occasional use, my 9 year old tore a hole in it through normal practice. So it can't be that tough if my 9 year old can hit it with his club and tear a hole in it. He's even small for his age.
customer_reviews.author: GolferMan

customer_reviews.title: Good place to start and take a slow approach to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good place to start and take a slow approach to seeing how your swing should be lining up at impact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up so far.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned this might fall apart easily but it is holding up really well. I filled it with old sheets and it will move around a lot and you need to put it back in place often. I expected that because you don't want your golf club hitting a heavy object. I had an old back pack that I filled with sand and I place the Smash Bag in front of it. That helps somewhat in keeping the bag in place at least for a few hits. I do feel when I practice with the bag and then hit a ball it makes a difference. I am new at golf so I would recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: The Rose

customer_reviews.title: Smashing Bag
customer_reviews.text: This really seems to work. Easy to use and seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: datspeed

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Zipper. Kept getting stuck. Also I filled it with a variety of things but was unsure what was best - had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore M. Mancino

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is starting to tear already. i haven't had it a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and it does improve my swing
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I thought it would do. I love this product and it does improve my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G. Lesiuk

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product does allow you to see how you are hitting your clubs. Our grandchildren, who have just started playing golf, have used it as a practice too.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeping Soundly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: larger than you think it is. Works when used properly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: don't see the point
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my husband...seems silly...have to stuff it with blankets..i might as well have just drawn a target on a pillow
customer_reviews.author: cndygrl

customer_reviews.title: good training aid
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these to help with keeping the hands forward at impact. Also, this is a great aid to have if you are scuffing or hitting behind the ball. I set up the impact bag about 2 feet behind the ball. then take my normal swing. if I hit the bag on the downswing, then I need to swing more on a downward stroke. I took another the swing and try to miss the bag while maintaining wrist cock with the hands forward. when I did this properly, it resulted in a clean well struck shot. no more fat hits.
customer_reviews.author: Zigfeldman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seam split after less than a month of use. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We were first exposed to this during our golf lessons and found it helpful. Great to have it at home for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Miriah

customer_reviews.title: this is the worst product of hundreds from amazon I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: this is the worst product of hundreds from amazon I have ever bought. I have now sent two back because the seams do not hold. no more exchanges for me, just a refund and move on to a different source.
customer_reviews.author: roy messer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I tried 2 of them - stitching on the bottom busted on both after 5-10 swings
customer_reviews.author: Michael Imbrogno

customer_reviews.title: Great aid
customer_reviews.text: The bag has met all my expectations. It is a great training aid and one that can be used in a small training area and in almost any weather.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Rick Smith Smash bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my son and he uses it all the time. Now he can practice golf any day and any time.
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Product does not withstand impact. Find a better one, but don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions, took half swings into the bag. Within two days, the seam at the bottom has already torn.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ball

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: JUNK; coming apart at seams in 2 days after only hit hard 2x and 40 half power hits
customer_reviews.author: J. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: SKLZ  Smash Bag for golf training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to practice my full golf swing and works great... would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made well if you really need something like this. I failed to see the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Havalittlefaith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice tool. Wish I had bought sooner. Well constructed and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Berdinka

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting your swing in proper alignment
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting your swing in proper alignment. The instructions say to fill the bag with old towels, et cetera. No specific weight is given. I use it pretty much daily. Seems to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: ottomon

customer_reviews.title: Very usable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a golf instructor. Have used it on a regular basis with my students for a year. No problems with it's longevity so far. It is necessary to stuff it tightly with bath towels and anchor it to the ground securely.
customer_reviews.author: phantomtofor

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the fact that I would have to fill it ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that I would have to fill it with stuffing. I'd rather have it ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the newbie
customer_reviews.text: Ive just recently gotten the golf bug, and I can understand why all the guys at work think this is a stupid device (they have all been playing for years). Golf is about being consistent and knowing what shot your going to get when you pull a club out of your bag, I don't have that yet. I just got this today and can see how this will hopefully help my game after only an hour of use. Will update in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Used it for 10 swings and it split at the seam!!!
customer_reviews.author: Galooshka

customer_reviews.title: Smashing it
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem of shanking on the tees of par 3's the smash bag help alter the hand position at impact , great item
customer_reviews.author: aderyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bag. I'm glad I didn't just buy the first one I saw at my instructor's site. This seller was having them for a great price including shipping (I think...it was a little over a year ago now). Good wide carrying strap, wide opening zipper which allows you to put towels and/or weights into the bag. Nothing says you have to hit just one side of the bag, so this bag could last you a good, long time. I had a good experience with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Busted open at seams after one week had to have it restiched
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hipp

customer_reviews.title: SKLZ Smash Bag
customer_reviews.text: Have had the bag for over a month. Stuffed with blankets and towels. Using a flat club with no sharp leading edges to cushion the impact, (Hybrid) The one side is already coming apart. I try to hit between 20 and 40 swings per day. I have rotated the bag and use all 4 sides to even out the wear. I use it in the garage against a cabinet so it doesn't move away. I like what it does and it is great exercise. Will see how long the other 3 sides last.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with what to fill the bag up with so that I could hit it without chasing it. Solution: About 30 magazines and a few old T-Shirts on the side of the bag that you hit. It is not going anywhere now!
customer_reviews.author: Brett M. Loxterman

customer_reviews.title: good to get the right feel
customer_reviews.text: perfect to use anywhere. good training tool. wish it would have came with a rod to anchor down
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C

product_meta.title: SKLZ Smash Bag Golf Impact Swing Trainer
product_meta.description:
Learn the feeling of the correct ball impact for your swing with a high quality impact trainer. Hitting into the Smash Bag helps eliminate fat and thin golf shots, helps cure slices and improves overall accuracy.

PVC, NylonMade in USA and ImportedSmash bag impact trainer for learning the correct clubface impactTarget map provides visual feedback on the quality and accuracy of impactHelps eliminate fat and thin shots and cure slices; easy-to-interpret targetHeavy-duty, high-impact material fills with old towels or clothesPerfect safe for you and your club; ideal in combination with other trainers
feature_bullets: Teaches the feeling of the correct impact, eliminates fat and thin shots and helps cure slices
Proprietary target map provides visual feedback on the quality and accuracy of impact
Quickly fills with towels or clothes
Use at home or on the range
Safe for you and your clubs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
